abstract: The three firms subpoenaed by the top securities regulator in Massachussets are Merrill Lynch, UBS Securities and Banc of America Investment Services.
snippet: The three firms subpoenaed by the top securities regulator in Massachussets are Merrill Lynch, UBS Securities and Banc of America Investment Services.
lead_paragraph: The top securities regulator in Massachusetts has subpoenaed Merrill Lynch, UBS Securities and Banc of America Investment Services for information relating to their sales of auction-rate preferred shares.

headline.main: 3 Firms Are Asked for Data on Auction-Rate Shares
headline.print_headline: 3 Firms Are Asked for Data On Auction-Rate Shares
